title: Community Outreach Week
author: Gihon Media Team
excerpt: Our community reached hundreds with food drives, school visits, and neighborhood cleanups.
body: This week, volunteers from Gihon Hebrew Synagogue visited schools and held a community cleanup.
We partnered with local organizations to distribute supplies and share encouraging messages.
Thank you to all volunteers and sponsors who made this possible.
